## Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites interested suppliers to submit a Statement of Capabilities for the Maintenance and Repair of Wintersteiger machinery at the Lacombe Research & Development Centre in Lacombe, Alberta.

## Technical Requirements

The contractor will be required to provide annual maintenance and inspection services for Wintersteiger seeding, harvesting, and seed-processing equipment. This includes:

* Annual maintenance and inspection of machinery equipped with Internal Combustion Engines (ICE) or electric motors and hydraulic systems
* Inspection of machines to identify potential problems and worn, broken, or missing parts
* Repair or replacement of worn, broken, or missing parts and return the machine to full operational readiness
* Preparation and provision of a final report for each piece of machinery

## Evaluation Criteria

To be considered, suppliers must demonstrate by statement that they meet the following requirements:

* Be an authorized Wintersteiger dealer certified to maintain and repair Wintersteiger agricultural equipment

## Tender Details

* Estimated Value: $288,750.00 (including GST) for the initial contract period and all option periods
* Contract Period: August 1, 2024, to July 31, 2025, with four (4) one (1)-year option periods
* Pre-identified Contractor: Wintersteiger Inc.

## Solicitation Notice

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada hereby notifies the supplier community of its intention to negotiate with one firm only. Should you have any questions concerning this requirement, please contact the Contracting Authority.

## Contracting Authority
